p: The crude extract and solvent fractions reduced ALP level at all doses (P<0.001). Whereas, total bilirubin was reduced at 200 mg/kg (P<0.05) and 400 mg/kg (P<0.001) of the crude and chloroform fraction; and at doses of 200 mg/kg (P<0.01) and 400 mg/kg (P<0.001) with the aqueous fraction as compared to paracetamol only.
